character.name: Creed Bratton
character.description: Who is Creed, really? And how did he manage to hold on to his job for so long? Dunder Mifflin’s cryptic old coot was a walking enigma, and yet never less than fascinating. It felt like the writers could add any wild anecdote to his backstory — he played in a famous rock band! He was a cult leader! He speaks Chinese! — and we’d buy it. When he was arrested in the series finale, we could only say: “Of course.”
